chapter.title: Initializing GStreamer
chapter.para: When writing a GStreamer application, you can simply include gst/gst.h to get access to the library functions.
Before the GStreamer libraries can be used gst_init () has to be performed from the main app. this call will perform first initialisation and will parse the GStreamer specific command line options.
A typical program would start like this:
It is also possible to call the gst_init method with two NULL argumants.
Use the GST_VERSION_MAJOR, GST_VERSION_MINOR and GST_VERSION_MICRO macros to get the GStreamer version you are building against.
